verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David חַלְּצֵ֣נִי <WH2502> Deliver יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> me O LORD מֵאָדָ֣ם <WH120> man רָ֑ע <WH7451> from the evil מֵאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> man חֲמָסִ֣ים <WH2555> me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃ <WH5341> preserve

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who חָשְׁב֣וּ <WH2803> Which imagine רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> mischiefs בְּלֵ֑ב <WH3820> in [their] heart כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner י֝֗וֹם <WH3117> continually יָג֥וּרוּ <WH1481> are they gathered together מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ <WH4421> [for] war

שָֽׁנֲנ֣וּ <WH8150> They have sharpened לְשׁוֹנָם֮ <WH3956> their tongues כְּֽמוֹ־ <WH3644> as נָ֫חָ֥שׁ <WH5175> like a serpent חֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> poison עַכְשׁ֑וּב <WH5919> adders' תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> is under שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <WH8193> [is] under their lips סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

שָׁמְרֵ֤נִי <WH8104> Keep יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> me O LORD מִ֘ידֵ֤י <WH3027> from the hands רָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> of the wicked מֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man חֲמָסִ֣ים <WH2555> me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי <WH5341> preserve אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ <WH2803> who have purposed לִדְח֥וֹת <WH1760> to overthrow פְּעָמָֽי׃ <WH6471> my goings

טָֽמְנֽוּ־ <WH2934> have hid גֵאִ֨ים ׀ <WH1343> The proud פַּ֡ח <WH6341> a snare לִ֗י וַחֲבָלִ֗ים <WH2256> for me and cords פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <WH6566> they have spread רֶ֭שֶׁת <WH7568> a net לְיַד־ <WH3027> by מַעְגָּ֑ל <WH4570> the wayside מֹקְשִׁ֖ים <WH4170> gins שָֽׁתוּ־ <WH7896> they have set לִ֣י סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> for me Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> I said לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֵ֣לִי <WH410> Thou [art] my God אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> hear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> of my supplications

יְהֹוִ֣ה <WH3069> O GOD אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> the Lord עֹ֣ז <WH5797> the strength יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <WH3444> of my salvation סַכֹּ֥תָה <WH5526> thou hast covered לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י <WH7218> my head בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day נָֽשֶׁק׃ <WH5402> of battle

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> Grant יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> not O LORD מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י <WH3970> the desires רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> of the wicked זְמָמ֥וֹ <WH2162> not his wicked device אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֝פֵ֗ק <WH6329> further יָר֥וּמוּ <WH7311> [lest] they exalt סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> themselves Selah

רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> [As for] the head מְסִבָּ֑י <WH4524> of those that compass me about עֲמַ֖ל <WH5999> let the mischief שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <WH8193> of their own lips [יְכַסּוּמֹו כ] (יְכַסֵּֽמֹו <WH3680> clad self ק)

[יָמִיטוּ כ] (יִמֹּ֥וטוּ <WH4131> be carried ק) עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> and גֶּֽחָ֫לִ֥ים <WH1513> Let burning coals בָּאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> into the fire יַפִּלֵ֑ם <WH5307> upon them let them be cast בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת <WH4113> into deep pits בַּֽל־ <WH1077> cannot יָקֽוּמוּ׃ <WH6965> that they rise not up again

אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man לָשׁוֹן֮ <WH3956> babbler בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִכּ֪וֹן <WH3559> be established בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the earth אִישׁ־ <WH376> man חָמָ֥ס <WH2555> the violent רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ <WH6679> shall hunt לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃ <WH4073> to overthrow

[יָדַעְתָּ כ] (יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> acknowledge ק) כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> will maintain יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> that the LORD דִּ֣ין <WH1779> the cause עָנִ֑י <WH6041> of the afflicted מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט <WH4941> [and] the right אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃ <WH34> of the poor

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Surely צַ֭דִּיקִים <WH6662> Surely the righteous יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> shall give thanks לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> unto thy name יֵשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> shall dwell יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> the upright אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> in thy presence
